string-array.name: language_tips
string-array.item: Immerse yourself in English media such as movies, TV shows, podcasts, and books. This not only exposes you to authentic language use but also helps improve your listening skills, pronunciation, and overall comprehension.

When using quizzes for language learning, vary question types to cover multiple skills. Review both correct and incorrect answers to reinforce learning. Create quizzes at different difficulty levels for continuous challenge and growth.

When using flashcards for language learning, strive for active engagement rather than passive memorization. Review regularly and focus on the words or phrases that prove more challenging,ensuring a comprehensive grasp of the language.

Don\'t forget to track your progress today! Check out our Progress section to see how far you\'ve come in your language learning journey. It\'s a great way to stay motivated and celebrate your achievements!
Expand your learning horizons today! Visit our resource page for more information about our app. FluentU is a treasure trove waiting to enhance your language learning journey!

Define achievable language learning goals by specifying weekly targets for learning new words and practicing specific conversation topics. Ensure these goals are realistic and trackable, and adapt them as you progress in your language learning journey.
When using flashcards, tap to translate the text and use the text-to-speech feature for active listening. Enhance your pronunciation and comprehension by hearing the words aloud
Consistent daily practice across speaking, listening, reading, and writing is crucial for language improvement. Allocate a short time each day to work on these key skills in your target language.
Personalize your profile with accurate details and a clear picture to enhance your user experience. Providing genuine information helps create a more engaging and tailored experience within the app.
